translation.ko: 어쨌든 너희가 나랑 함께 들어가 줬으면 좋겠어

translation.en: Will you please go in there with me?
Huh, well, with a pep talk like that, how could I say no?
Pfft, whatever. Let's just go kick some Redcoat ass!
translation.ko: 좋아, 영국군 놈들 궁둥짝을 걷어차러 가자

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait! At least… Just let me do an entrance thing.
translation.ko: 잠깐 기다려! 입장은 내가 하면 안 될까?

translation.en: Ding dong! It's America, motherfucker!
Oh, Georgie! Well, color me surprised.
Oh, I'll color you fuckin' dead, Ben!
[laughs] Bravo! Did you practice that line in the car on your way here?
translation.ko: 브라보! 자동차 타고 오는 동안 그 대사를 준비한 건가?

translation.en: What the fuck is a car?
And, no, it was a rebuttal to something that you just said!
translation.ko: 그리고 준비한 대사 아니고 이 자리에서 생각한 거야!

translation.en: How could I have thought of it in advance
translation.ko: 네가 무슨 말을 할 줄 알고

translation.en: if you said it just now and I came up with the perfect rebuttal?
translation.ko: 내가 대사를 준비했겠어? 즉석에서 받아친 거지!

translation.en: Oh, pardon me.
I forgot you aren't versed in the gentlemanly art of debate,
translation.ko: 네가 신사들의 토론 기술에 무지하다는 사실을 깜빡했어

translation.en: like your best friend, Abe Lincoln.
Oh, or should I say ex-best friend?
-Because he's dead. -Damn, he's good.
-All right, fuck this. -[glass shatters]
-[motor revs] -[yelling] For Abe!
-[Samuel] Yippie-kay-yay, motherfu-- Whoa! -[electrical buzzing]
-[Samuel] Watch it, witch! -[Edison] You watch it, dick!
[George] Yeah. Well, that could've gone better.
Ya think? Edison almost got everybody killed!
translation.ko: 조금? 에디슨 때문에 우리 다 죽을 뻔했잖아!

translation.en: -Everybody almost got everybody killed! -Where's Arnold?
translation.ko: - 너희는 안 그런 줄 알아? - 아널드는 어딨지?

translation.en: And where's Geronimo? He smells like campfire.
translation.ko: 제로니모는 어딨고? 걔한테 모닥불 냄새가 나

translation.en: You carry an unusual scent for a man.
Almost like you're not a man at all, but a--
Stay and fight, you dick!
Damn it! Oh, my God! Geronimo!
That bastard bit me!
It can't be. I thought they were just a myth.
The Navajo have a name for their kind. Skinwalker.
I won't live with this curse.
-Hand me my ax. -Are you sure?
Does my grandfather shit in the woods?
Um, I… Does he? I didn't know him.
It's what we call bears.
We call bears "grandfather."
Fuck it, just give me my ax!
Whoa, whoa, Geronimo! What happened? Are you okay?
Go! I'll take care of him.
She's right, he's not important. Arnold's getting away!
translation.ko: 맞아, 제로니모는 안 중요해 아널드가 도망가잖아!

translation.en: No! No. We never leave a man behind.
Edison, dress that wound. Paul, call your horse.
translation.ko: 에디슨, 상처를 치료해 폴, 말을 불러!

translation.en: Hey, Clyde!
-That way! -Run, Clyde, run!
Welcome to hell… acopter?
I'm still working on it. I don't love it, but I don't hate it.
translation.ko: 내가 만든 드립인데 썩 맘에 들진 않지만 괜찮잖아?

translation.en: -[Edison] Paul, you were amazing. -[Paul] Aw, thank you, human lady friend.
translation.ko: - 폴, 너 대단하다! - 고마워, 여자 사람 친구!

translation.en: And, Sam, your propensity for murder is extraordinary.
translation.ko: 샘, 너도 살인에 대한 열정이 남다른 것 같은데?

translation.en: Thank you. I took murder lessons from John Wick.
translation.ko: 고맙다, 존 윅에게서 살인 수업을 받았지

translation.en: -[gasps] The candle maker? -Yeah!
That dude is a fuckin' psycho! [laughs]
Yo, check it. The carriage stopped.
[George] But why would he stop here?
The road to Delaware!
Sea-Doo, bitches!
Paul, can your sizable steed clear that river?
translation.ko: 폴, 네 말 친구가 저 강을 넘을 수 있을까?

translation.en: -Only one way to find out. -[neighs]
In God I trust.
[Samuel] Oh, shit.
He shorted it, Paul. Hey, Paul, he shorted it.
Clyde! His natural buoyancy can support us all!
translation.ko: 클라이드가 물에 떴어 우리도 올라탈 수 있겠는데

translation.en: [George coughing] Jesus Christ! Did you know that your horse could swim that fast?
translation.ko: 세상에, 네 말이 저렇게 헤엄을 잘 치는지 알고 있었어?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, Clyde's a great swimmer.
He's great at so many things. So proud!
Thank you, Geronimo. Your hair looks even better wet.
translation.ko: 고마워, 제로니모 머리 젖으니까 더 멋있다

translation.en: Y'all a bunch of idiots.
[sighs] This feels like the end…
of the first act… of my life.
All hope is lost.
What do we even do now? Where do we go from here?
translation.ko: 이젠 뭘 해야 할까? 어디로 가야 하지?

translation.en: [gasps] Where we go isn't the question.
The question is,
translation.ko: 중요한 건 앙트레를 가져가느냐 디저트를 가져가느냐지

translation.en: do we bring an entree or a fucking dessert?
translation.ko: 중요한 건 앙트레를 가져가느냐 디저트를 가져가느냐지 "극비 모임"

translation.en: [Edison] Oh, guys, Gettysburg is impossibly vast.
Finding this address is like finding a needle in a haystack.
translation.ko: 장소 찾기가 모래사장에서 바늘 찾기만큼 어렵겠어

translation.en: Yeah, Edison's right. Let's just give up.
-That is not what I said. -What? Dudes, look, we tried.
translation.ko: - 난 그런 말 한 적 없어 - 왜? 우린 노력했어

translation.en: One thing. We literally tried one thing.
translation.ko: 우린 딱 한 가지 방법만 시도했어

translation.en: Yeah, and it didn't work.
-[horn sounds] -We all got wet, Edison. God!
Look, this isn't fun anymore.
Uh, I can fix that.
Let's get hammered!
Then, fuck it, we hit the streets mob-rules style.
translation.ko: 그러고 나서 주먹으로 거리를 제패하는 거지

translation.en: Anyone we see who doesn't look like us, they see the bottom of our boots!
translation.ko: 우리랑 다르게 생긴 것들은 면상에 킥을 날려줄 거야!

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Okay, fine, no Indians this time. Ooh, geez.
Oh, my God. I don't know how many times I have to tell you, Sam.
translation.ko: 세상에, 대체 몇 번을 말해줘야 알아먹을 거니?

translation.en: -This is not India. -Also, you're a fucking racist.
translation.ko: - 여긴 인도가 아니야 - 그리고 넌 레이시스트야

translation.en: Uh, no, Paul's the racist.
He's the best horse racist in the colonies.
translation.ko: 승마 레이스에서 폴을 이길 사람은 없지

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a great racist.
Holy shit.
Who wants pizza rolls and purple stuff?
-Oh, wow, Chief Geronimo! -Just Geronimo is fine.
-You're the famous renegade tracker. -Sure.
And [gasps] you're Thomas Edison, the world-renowned scientist!
[scoffs] The same.
Wow, George, the team is really shaping up nicely.
Oh, no. No, we're not a team anymore, Martha. We quit.
translation.ko: 우린 이제 팀이 아니야, 마사 난 관둘 거거든

translation.en: -What? -Besides, the revolution was Abe's thing.
I tried to avenge him, but we blew it.
translation.ko: 난 복수하고 싶었는데 결국 실패하고 말았지

translation.en: Now, we're just gonna jam a bit and slam some beers.
translation.ko: 같이 연주나 하며 맥주를 들이켤 생각이야

translation.en: This is a basic blues riff, guys.
Just watch me for the changes. All right, losers, let's party.
translation.ko: 변주할 때 잘 따라와 좋아, 루저들아, 파티하자!

translation.en: No! George Bon Jovi Washington, you do not get to party.
translation.ko: 아니, 조지 본 조비 워싱턴 당신은 파티할 자격 없어!

translation.en: -What? -Would Abe want to party right now?
Abe never wanted to party.
Because he had goals, unrealized dreams.
translation.ko: 이뤄야 할 목표와 꿈이 있어서 그랬던 거야

translation.en: But you bet your ass once those dreams were realized,
translation.ko: 만약 에이브가 살아 있었다면 그 꿈을 실현한 뒤에

translation.en: he would've snorted a line as long as the Magna Carta.
translation.ko: 책상 가득 코카인을 깔아놓고 코로 흡입했을걸?

translation.en: Really? No. Abe? My Abe?
translation.ko: 진짜? 설마… 내가 아는 그 에이브가?

translation.en: Are you kidding? With that head?
[laughs] Dude was all sinus. He was made for the marching powder.
translation.ko: 콧구멍이 겁나 길어서 코카인 빨기에 완벽하잖아

translation.en: Not how cocaine works.
Now, those goals are your goals.
Those unrealized dreams are your unrealized dreams.
translation.ko: 에이브가 이루려던 꿈을 당신이 이뤄야만 해

translation.en: That's the promise that you made, right?
So, achieve those goals.
Realize those dreams.
And then, you can party like a rich white man
translation.ko: 그다음에 부유한 백인 남자처럼 맘껏 파티하며

translation.en: who will never face adversity for the rest of his glorious life!
translation.ko: 영광스러운 여생을 평화 속에서 사는 거야!

translation.en: You're right. I have to earn it.
That is what Abe would want,
that insane coke-hound! [chuckles]
Guys, I've thought about it.
I'm willing to give it another shot if you are.
translation.ko: 너희만 괜찮다면 한 번 더 도전해 볼까 해

translation.en: -What do you say? -Sure, man.
Um, you're the one who quit.
If we can find Arnold, we can force the Gettysburg Address out of him.
translation.ko: 아널드를 찾아내서 협박하면 모임 장소를 캐낼 수 있어

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, did none of you notice my fucking arm?
translation.ko: 미안한데 내 빌어먹을 팔이 어떻게 됐는지 안 보여?

translation.en: Benedict Arnold is a werewolf!
In some cultures, known as a skinwalker.
He ain't givin' up shit unless he thinks we're an actual threat to him.
translation.ko: 우릴 위협으로 느끼게 해야만 정보를 뽑아낼 수 있어

translation.en: The only way to be an actual threat to him--
Is if we have a silver bullet.
-Exactly. -Wait, what are we doing again?
A silver bullet? Who could ever even make such a thing?
translation.ko: 은으로 만든 총알? 그런 걸 누가 만들 수 있지?

translation.en: I know a blacksmith.
He made this armor and I've never taken it off.
translation.ko: 이 갑옷도 만들어줬어 그 뒤로 한 번도 안 벗었지

translation.en: Okay. Okay! We'll visit this blacksmith
and he will discover the secret of the impossible weapon we require.
translation.ko: 우리에게 필요한 전설적 무기의 비밀을 파헤쳐 줄 거야

translation.en: Because our cause is just!
It is righteous!
It is His will! His and Abe's!
-And the Earth Mother's. -Nope.
-And Isaac Newton's. -Nope. Just God's.
I hold these truths to be self-evident.
All for one and one for all!
translation.ko: 하나는 모두를 위해 모두는 하나를 위해!

translation.en: We will find the Gettysburg Address.
[all] Huzzah!
[Paul] Huzzah! Nope, too late.
-Smittay! -[bell chimes]
Damn! Fuck my life.
We're friends.
Do I even wanna know why you need a silver bullet?
translation.ko: 은 총알이 왜 필요한 건지 굳이 물어봐야 할까?

translation.en: Best that you not know, Mr. Smith.
Why do you keep calling me Mr. Smith?
Well, Revere called you Black Smith.
-Right, because I'm a blacksmith. -Right. A Black Smith.
-A blacksmith. -Black Smith.
I'm a smith who works with metal,
which oxidizes during the heating process and turns black.
translation.ko: 까만 연장을 만드는 대장일을 하는 장인이야

translation.en: -So, you're a Smith. -Exactly.
-Of the Baltimore Smiths? -[sighs]
Just tell me what you need it for.
It'll be used to free the colonies. Let's just leave it at that.
translation.ko: 식민지 해방을 위한 겁니다 그 정도만 말씀드리죠

translation.en: Oh, you're talking about the Brits.
Shit, why didn't you say so? I'm definitely down for that.
translation.ko: 젠장, 진작 말하지! 그런 거라면 찬성이지

translation.en: -You are? -Fuck, yeah!
I mean, don't get it twisted.
I definitely do not trust you motherfuckers.
You three, especially.
But fuck, man, I hate the British.
translation.ko: 그래도 인정할 건 해야지 난 영국 놈들이 싫어

translation.en: Why, what have the fun police done to you?
Look around. I'm a small business owner.
What's a small business owner's greatest enemy?
-Large businesses? -Thin profit margins?
-Rising lube costs? -White people stealing everything you own.
translation.ko: - 윤활제 가격 상승? - 재산 몰수하는 백인들

translation.en: -Having a squirrel for a friend? -No.
-Staff turnover? -Tesla being a bitch?
-Not getting drunk at lunch? -White people stealing everything you own.
translation.ko: - 점심에 술 못 먹는 거 - 재산 몰수하는 백인들

translation.en: Constant instinct to second-guess
having risked your savings on unproven business acumen?
translation.ko: 전 재산을 투자했는데 계속해서 밀려드는 후회?

translation.en: -No, it's taxes. -Taxes. Correct.
Small business taxes. And what's the big knock against the British?
translation.ko: 영세상인은 세금을 두려워하지 그런데 영국의 단점이 뭐야?

translation.en: -Something about taxation! -Exactly.
You'll help us? You'll craft the silver bullet free of charge?
translation.ko: 그럼 도와주시는 거예요? 무료로 만들어주는 거죠?

translation.en: What? Are you white motherfuckers crazy?
translation.ko: 뭐? 이 백인 새끼들이 단체로 정신 나갔나?

translation.en: I just told you I'm a small business owner.
You think I'm gonna give you silver for free?
translation.ko: 그런데 은으로 만든 걸 공짜로 주겠어?

translation.en: Well, we don't have silver.
The British seized it all when they got here--
Spoons. Teaspoons. I remember.
Why do you think that shit's so expensive?
Okay. Well, how much do we need for, like, one bullet?
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그럼 총알 하나에 얼마 드리면 되죠?

translation.en: -A metric shit-ton. -For one bullet?
Oh, I'm sorry. Are you a fucking metallurgist like me?
translation.ko: 어이, 미안한데 네가 금속 전문가라도 되냐?

translation.en: -That's, like, a thousand spoons! -Three thousand.
It's a metric shit-ton.
Where are we gonna get 3,000 spoons overnight, bro?
translation.ko: 하룻밤 사이에 스푼 3천 개를 어디서 구해요?

translation.en: Well…
[blacksmith] May I present, the year's biggest tea party.
translation.ko: 올해 최대 규모의 티 파티가 열리는 곳이야

translation.en: You need silver spoons, you need to get aboard that ship.
translation.ko: 은 스푼을 구하려면 저 배에 꼭 타야만 해

translation.en: Wait a minute. How did you know about this?
[Samuel] What's up with these assholes and flyers?
translation.ko: 저 전단지는 다 뭐지? "오늘만 - 공짜 은 스푼!"

translation.en: Well, it's a great way to communicate with a widespread audience,
translation.ko: 다양한 사람과 소통할 수 있는 효과적인 수단이거든

translation.en: much like direct mail or the Pony Express, where my brother does not work.
translation.ko: 광고 우편, 조랑말 우편 같은 거지 내 형제가 직원이라는 건 아니고

translation.en: -[grunts] All right. Shall we? -Wait, wait, wait. Wait!
-We need a plan. -Why?
Well, last time we didn't have one and things got shitty.
-Huh? -Yeah, Geronimo lost his arm.
-No, he lost like three-fifths of an arm. -[scoffs] Seriously?
Oh, thoughts and prayers.
Look, good leaders like Abe have a plan for everything.
translation.ko: 에이브 같은 좋은 리더는 항상 계획을 세워

translation.en: -All right, His Leadership, let's hear it. -Okay.
So, Mr. Smith, you'll be the lookout.
-[blacksmith laughs] Nope. -What?
You want me, a Black dude, to sit here in the dark, alone,
translation.ko: 나 같은 흑인 남자는 혼자 이 어두운 곳에서

translation.en: to play lookout for you while you break the law?
Oh, hell no! I hate the British but I ain't lookin' to get killed.
translation.ko: 싫어! 영국군은 싫지만 죽을 생각은 없어

translation.en: So, y'all are on your own to get that silver.
translation.ko: 난 빼고 너희끼리 은을 구하도록 해

translation.en: But if you do get it, I'll make your little bullet.
All right. Then… here's the plan.
Geronimo, you'll be the lookout. Are you cool with being the lookout?
translation.ko: 제로니모가 망을 봐줘 망보는 거 괜찮겠어?

translation.en: I mean, if my choice is to be the lookout
or have one of you looking out for me, yeah, I'll be the lookout.
translation.ko: 내 뒤를 맡길 바에는 내가 망보는 게 낫지

translation.en: Great. Okay. Edison, you'll pose as the wife of an officer already on board.
translation.ko: 좋아, 에디슨은 배에 탄 장교의 아내로 위장해

translation.en: [groans] This is taking too long. Let's just dress as those guys.
translation.ko: 너무 오래 걸린다 그냥 영국군 제복을 입자

translation.en: [all] Ello, guv.
Well, technically, that is a plan.
Just technically, a very bad plan.
Ha! I told you a jail would be a better use of space than lifeboats.
translation.ko: 구명보트 창고보단 감옥이 더 쓸모 있다고 말했잖아

translation.en: Hey, at least we got on board, right, guys?
I consider this mission accomplished. Ooh, we should get a banner.
translation.ko: 난 미션 성공이라고 생각해 우리 배너 하나 만들까?

translation.en: Ugh, shockingly, Sam's not wrong. We can still make this work.
translation.ko: 샘의 말이 틀린 건 아냐 아직 희망이 있어

translation.en: I've taken note of how often the guards go on rounds.
-If we lay low for a few hours-- -No!
Enough with all of the planning!
Did Magellan have a plan when he circumnavigated the globe?
translation.ko: 마젤란이 세계를 일주할 때 계획을 세웠을 것 같아?

translation.en: -[all] No! -[Edison] Yes.
That took a lot of preparation.
We'll set our course for freedom using only our wits as our guide.
translation.ko: 우리의 기지를 지도 삼아 자유를 향해 달려 나가자

translation.en: Mr. Revere, tear down that wall.
What is this place?
I don't know, but don't touch any--
Ooh, oops.
They're steeping the colonists in tea!
Turning them British. James, you sick bastard!
translation.ko: 영국군으로 만드는 거군 제임스, 이 변태 같은 자식!

translation.en: Look, as far as I can tell, this is a test run.
James is up to something bigger than crushing the revolution.
translation.ko: 제임스는 혁명을 막는 것보다 더 큰 음모를 꾸미고 있어

translation.en: Maybe even… Oh, fuck! I don't even want to say it!
translation.ko: 어쩌면… 젠장! 차마 입에 못 담겠어

translation.en: -Just say it. -Something global.
-That means… -There are global stakes now.
translation.ko: - 그 말은… - 전 세계가 위험하다는 거지

translation.en: Good God! Can you figure out what he's planning?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 놈의 계략을 알아낼 방법이 있을까?

translation.en: Yeah, I think I can. If I can just hack the mainframe.

I found an old note from Abe last night.
And he said he wished he had a million friends like me.
translation.ko: 나 같은 친구를 백만 명 원한다는 내용이었지

translation.en: And that's when I realized, I can have a million friends.
translation.ko: 그 순간 깨달았어 내겐 백만 명의 친구가 있단 걸!

translation.en: Oh! Why settle for 20 bros when you could have a million,
translation.ko: 브라더가 20명 있는 것보단 백만 명 있는 게 좋지!

translation.en: no matter how different they look.
Exactly! Sam, that's the American way!
translation.ko: 그거야! 샘, 그게 바로 미국의 방식이야

translation.en: Hey, guys. Did ya hear?
I'm not racist anymore! I'm doin' it!
translation.ko: 난 더 이상 레이시스트가 아냐 난 발전했어!

translation.en: Super.
George, how did you do this?
How did you reach this many people overnight?
translation.ko: 이 많은 사람들을 어떻게 하루 만에 모았어?

translation.en: I remembered something one of my friends told me about flyers.
translation.ko: 새로 생긴 절친이 내게 해준 전단지 얘기를 기억했지 "식민지 킹코"

translation.en: They're a great way to communicate with a widespread audience.
translation.ko: 다양한 사람과 소통할 수 있는 효과적인 수단이거든 "혁명에 동참하세요! 내일 정오"

translation.en: I spent all night distributing these all over this great land,
translation.ko: 밤새 위대한 미국 땅을 돌며 이 종이를 나눠줬어

translation.en: from sea to shining sea.
[Thomas] That's thousands of miles! How did you--
Oh, I had a little help from the fastest racist in the colonies!
translation.ko: 식민지에서 제일가는 레이시스트의 도움을 약간 받았지!

translation.en: -[Samuel] What have they done to you? -[Geronimo] Does that hurt?
translation.ko: - 널 어떻게 한 거야? - 안 아프냐?

translation.en: [in robotic voice] The British are coming… to get their asses kicked!
translation.ko: 영국 놈들이 오고 있다 우리에게 된통 당하러!

translation.en: Heh. Well, I am just glad that we got the band back together.
translation.ko: 우리 팀이 이렇게 다시 모이게 돼서 정말 기쁘군

translation.en: All right, everybody, come on! Grab an AR-15.
translation.ko: 자, 여러분, 시작합시다! 다들 AR-15 하나씩 집어요

translation.en: These little death machines here are gonna even the odds for us.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 살인 기계가 우리의 승산을 높여줄 겁니다

translation.en: But once the war is over though, okay, I definitely need them back.
translation.ko: 하지만 전투가 끝나고 나면 꼭 제게 돌려주셔야 해요

translation.en: Yeah, man. No problem.
Yeah, they're just way too dangerous for civilians to keep. Am I right?
translation.ko: 민간인이 들고 다니기엔 너무 위험하잖아요, 맞죠?

translation.en: That is completely reasonable.
What in God's name are we waiting for?
Why are we not attacking?
Beggin' your pardon, me lord,
the Americans was just changing their kits into the stars and stripes, see?
Then they sang a song for a bit, yeah.
Now it looks like they're settlin' some personal differences.
translation.ko: 지금은 서로 의논 중인 것 같네요

translation.en: Shan't be long.
We don't have to wait for them to get dressed.
translation.ko: 옷 갈아입는 걸 우리가 뭐 하러 기다려줘?

translation.en: Attack, you idiots!
Copy that, Command. Commencing bombardment.
Now, let's go start a fucking revolution!
Kick it!
Tread on them! Tread the fuck all over them!
Oh, no.
Me-ronimo!
Edison, give me that juice!
For America! Charge!
[Benedict] Artillery. Open fire on the front.
[soldier over speaker] But, my lord, we'll hit our own men.
Fuck's sake. I'm evil!
We're the bad guys! Jesus, pay attention!
translation.ko: 우리가 나쁜 놈이라고! 정신 똑바로 차려!

translation.en: Now, open fire or I'll eat your bones!
translation.ko: 뼈까지 먹히기 싫으면 당장 사격 실시해!

translation.en: [clears throat] Commander.
[commander over speaker] Roger, roger. All cannon, open fire. Danger close.
translation.ko: 알겠습니다, 모든 대포는 아군을 무시하고 사격하라

translation.en: We've gotta do something about those cannons!
Wait a minute. Is that Martha?
Oh, my God! Edison, on me!
[grunts] Paul, take out those walkers or we're sunk!
translation.ko: 폴, 전멸하기 전에 저 워커들을 처리해!

translation.en: -Affirmative. Commencing attack run. -Edison, give me a lift.
I'm on it! Science, don't fail me now.
-[George] Edison, fly straight! -[Edison] My thrusters took some damage!
Just get me to that elephant!
-[Martha in British accent] Ello, guv'ner! -[laughing] Oh, Martha! Thank God!
translation.ko: - 안녕하신가, 형씨! - 오, 마사 다행이다, 당신이 무사해서 정말… 다행이야?

translation.en: I'm just so happy that you're… safe?
Stay on target.
Stay on target.
Well, Manchester, if you want something done right…
translation.ko: 맨체스터, 자기의 일은 스스로 하는 게 최고지?

translation.en: Get some! Get some! Get some! [grunts]
-What the… What are you? -[snaps]
Oi! Handball! That's a foul, ya wanker!
Maybe that's true in Britain.
But this is America, asshole! [grunts]
Touchdown!
[Benedict] What is the deal with these chaps?
It's like they have no quit in them.
No matter, I guess I'll just skip to the end, then.
translation.ko: 어차피 상관없어 내가 바로 끝을 내주지

translation.en: Game over, old friend.
We're surrounded. Why aren't they advancing?
Because that's not part of the plan, ya dumb twat!
translation.ko: 다 계획의 일부니까 이 멍청한 것아!

translation.en: Oh, fuck!
Holy! What is that thing?
It's a weather control device. Look at the tea bags.
translation.ko: 기상 조절 장치예요 저 티백을 봐요

translation.en: It's designed to seed the clouds… with tea!
Teabagging them? Literally? But why?
To make them rain tea.
Every man, woman and child beneath these spacious skies
translation.ko: 이 광활한 하늘 아래 있는 모든 사람들이

translation.en: will be turned British instantly.
The revolution will not only be over,
it will effectively have never even occurred.
Aw, fuck! These are those global stakes you were talking about, aren't they?
translation.ko: 망할, 이게 저번에 말한 세계 정복인 거네

translation.en: Yep. If he successfully British-izes every colonist in the New World,
translation.ko: 그래, 신세계의 식민지 주민을 모두 영국군으로 변신시키고 나면

translation.en: he won't stop there. He'll British-ize the entire world.
translation.ko: 거기서 멈추지 않고 전 세계를 변신시킬 거야

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay. You know what? Fuck it.
-It was fun while it lasted, boys. -Keep it.
This is your last moment as a colonist. You may as well enjoy it.
translation.ko: 미국인으로서의 마지막 순간이야 즐길 수 있을 때 즐겨

translation.en: Besides, it's sorta perfect.
I mean, beer's the exact opposite of tea.
So, one last "fuck you" to the Brits. Am I right?
The exact opposite. That's it! Sam, hold this keg steady.
translation.ko: 정반대라, 바로 그거야! 샘, 술통을 꽉 잡고 있어

translation.en: -But it's full of beer! -It better be.
-Blacksmith, hammer this valve into place. -On it!
Geronimo, keep track of where that thing is headed.
translation.ko: 제로니모, 저 장치가 어디로 가는지 보고 있어

translation.en: That won't be too hard.
And, Paul, I'm gonna need a lot of juice!
-Yo, Edison! What is that shit? -It is science.
The science that's going to win this war.
Last time you tried "science,"
you set off a bomb that almost killed us.
How can you be so sure that this will work?
Well, I'm not sure, Sammy, but I have a hypothesis.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 보장은 못 하지만 이미 가설은 세워졌어

translation.en: So, let's go test that hypothesis and draw some fucking conclusions!
translation.ko: 이제 그 가설을 실험해서 결론을 도출할 차례야!

translation.en: This is for science!
No! No! Not like this! Not like this, Martha!
translation.ko: 안 돼! 이렇게 죽을 순 없어, 마사!

translation.en: -Drink it, George! Drink it in. -No! I won't do it! Ah!
translation.ko: - 쭉 들이켜, 조지! - 싫어, 안 마셔!

translation.en: Fine, resist. And I'll gain full custody of our son the moment he is born.
translation.ko: 마시지 않으면 우리 아들은 나 혼자서 키울 거야

translation.en: And you'll be helpless to stop it.
You'll have failed as a leader, as a husband and as a father,
translation.ko: 넌 리더, 남편, 그리고 아버지로서 실패작이 될 거야

translation.en: just like your father before you.
Hey, hey, it's okay.
Even though you totally blew it
and let everyone on the team down, you tried your best, witch.
translation.ko: 모두가 실망하긴 했지만 그래도 최선을 다했잖아, 마녀야

translation.en: I'm not a witch, Sam. I am a scientist.
translation.ko: 난 마녀가 아니야, 샘 난 과학자라고

translation.en: And no, I did not.
The beam. It wasn't meant to blow the Teabagger out of the sky.
translation.ko: 레이저로 티백 장치를 터뜨리려는 게 아니었구나?

translation.en: -Nope. -Horse sound.
What did you do, human lady friend?
I reversed the polarity of the tea.
So, if it ain't tea no more, what the fuck is it?
The exact opposite of tea.
[gasps] It's beer! Beer won the war!
What? No, beer didn't win… No, science!
[all] Bro!
I'd just like to say something, you know, as the leader of the group.
Thirty minutes ago, I dreamed of a bigger fraternity.
translation.ko: 지금부터 30분 전에 우리 클럽의 확장을 꿈꿨더니

translation.en: And now, I look around and I have it.
That's the power of positive thinking, guys.
-Believe in yourselves! -Are you kidding me?
Mmm, delicious, isn't it?
Oh! George? What happened?
Science, Martha. Science happened.
Oh, my God! I could have… I almost…
[shushes] No, don't you worry about that.
translation.ko: 세상에, 내가 당신을… 하마터면… 아니, 그 일은 생각하지 마

translation.en: You're back now and we've just got one thing left to do.
translation.ko: 당신이 돌아왔으니 이제 할 일은 하나뿐이지

translation.en: -Have awesome sex! -Final boss battle. What?
Uh, yep. Yep. Final boss battle.
-Bro! -No!
Bros. Bros everywhere!
It reeks of Ye Olde Axe body spray!
translation.ko: 사내들의 디오더런트 냄새가 코를 찌르고 있어!

translation.en: [George] Excuse me, sir.
Do you have a moment to talk about freedom?
Aren't you surprised to see me leading the British and not King James?
translation.ko: 제임스왕 대신 내가 나타나서 놀라지 않았나?

translation.en: What? No. You obviously pulled a Benedict Arnold.
A what?
A Benedict Arnold. You're a thing now, bro.
Whenever you get fucked over by a trusted friend,
translation.ko: 믿던 친구가 내 등에 칼을 꽂는 상황을

translation.en: it's called getting Benedict Arnolded. Right, everybody?
-[all] Yeah. -It's totally a thing.
No. You… You can't just do that.
Oh, yeah, we can. Because we all voted on it.
And that's called…
[all] Fucking Democracy!
We're doin' it! [laughing] Oh, Georgie.
You think you've won.
Mega Wolf!
Geronimo, now!
Launch winch-chain.
Sammy, take the shot!
Here comes the boom, bitch.
Guys, I don't know how much more he can take!
-Where's the stupid bullet? -We're looking!
Any last regrets, old chum?
Yeah, I only regret that I have but one life to give for my country.
translation.ko: 조국을 위해 바칠 목숨이 하나뿐이라는 게 후회스럽다

translation.en: Yes. Well, I suppose the one will have to do.
translation.ko: 그래? 네 목숨은 하나면 충분할 것 같은데?

translation.en: Oh, shit! It's right here. Guys! I found it!
What are you smiling about, you idiot? You can't possibly kill me.
translation.ko: 왜 그리 실실 웃고 있지? 넌 날 죽일 수 없어

translation.en: I'm not trying to kill you, Ben.
They are. With America's favorite pastime.
translation.ko: 내 친구들과 아메리카의 국민 스포츠가 널 죽일 거야

translation.en: No!
Tax this, motherfucker!
[commentator] It's going way back to right field.
The bullet is still going! High up in there!
translation.ko: 총알이 여전히 하늘 높이 날아가고 있어요!

translation.en: -Bugger! -He did it!
John Henry Smith did it!
Welcome to America!
[George] I wanna make a monument for Abe, too.
But of course, Mr. President. Same as yours?
No, I.M. Pei.
His should be a statue of him sitting there, staring at my monument.
translation.ko: 반대편에 에이브의 석상을 만들어 제 탑을 바라볼 수 있게 하세요

translation.en: [Abe chuckling] Who are you, Demi Moore?
Why you gotta screw a ghost like that, George?
translation.ko: 유령 친구 민망하게 왜 그러냐, 조지?

translation.en: Abe! Ah, bro! God, it's good to see you again, man.
Well, you're gonna feel like a real turd after you see what I brought you. Hah!
translation.ko: 내가 가져온 걸 보면 기분이 더러워질걸?

translation.en: The Declaration! You saved it!
I did.
A little of Mr. Scotch's invisible tape and it's as good as new.
translation.ko: 스카치사의 투명 테이프로 완벽히 원상 복구했어

translation.en: It's beautiful, Abe.
It is, but you're the real national treasure here, George.
translation.ko: 맞아, 하지만 아메리카의 진정한 국보는 바로 너야

translation.en: I'm proud of you, bud.
And no, there's no treasure map drawn on the back of it.
translation.ko: 아니, 종이 뒤를 뒤져도 보물 지도는 없어, 이놈아

translation.en: -Oh, man. -George, what are you doin', bro?
-They're lookin' for you out there. -Oh, Sam!
I'm glad you're here. I have something for you.
translation.ko: 잘 왔어, 네게 줄 게 있거든

translation.en: -What is it? -A gift for my son's godfather.
translation.ko: - 뭔데? - 내 아들의 대부를 위한 선물

translation.en: -Who, me? -Yep.
I need someone I can trust with my son's life.
translation.ko: 내 아들의 목숨을 믿고 맡길 사람이 필요해

translation.en: And I always thought it would be Abe.
But with him as a gho… a goner, I need to find someone else.
translation.ko: 이제 유령, 아니, 죽었으니 다른 사람이 필요해

translation.en: George, I'm honored!
Hey, is that my hat? Oh, it is.
But… Ugh. I don't know how to be a caretaker. I don't have those instincts.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 누굴 돌보는 데엔 소질이 없는 것 같아

translation.en: No, don't think of it as being the caretaker.
Think of it as being family.
Like the fun, drunk,
now definitely no-longer-racist uncle that America has always needed.
translation.ko: 더는 인종 차별하지 않으며 이 나라에 꼭 필요한 삼촌

translation.en: Uncle Sam. I like It.
Uncle fucking Sam!
Come on, Uncle Sam, our countrymen await.
translation.ko: 가자, 엉클 샘 동포들이 기다리고 있어

translation.en: Hey, Denzel.
My fellow Americans, on this day, July 4th, 1776,
we are all finally free!
[man 1] What about your slaves?
-I said, what about your slaves? -[George] Well, see--
And what about women?
Will we be granted equality in your America?
translation.ko: 당신네 나라에서는 여자도 동등히 대해줄 건가요?

translation.en: -Yes, but-- -Sure, right after the Indians.
Wait a second. I was under the impression we were getting our land back.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 난 우리가 살던 땅을 돌려주는 줄 알았는데?

translation.en: Good point. Um…
Oh, hey, can I keep this here machine gun?
Like, if a Mexican tries to take my property or something?
translation.ko: 멕시코인들이 내 물건을 훔치려고 할 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: What? You just took this land from the Indians--
He was coming for you. I saw it!
-He just shot him! In the back! -He was making a move, man. I swear it!
translation.ko: - 뒤에서 총을 쏘다니! - 공격하려고 했다고, 맹세해!

translation.en: We're gonna have a fair and unbiased judicial process, right?
translation.ko: 공정한 사법 절차로 이 일을 처리해 줄 거죠?

translation.en: -Everyone, just calm down! -Fuck you!
No, fuck you!
Hey, I just wanna marry my boyfriend. Sinner!
There's gonna be comprehensive health care, right?
translation.ko: 보편적 보건 의료는 보장해 줄 거죠?

translation.en: [man 1] Seriously, dude. What about your slaves?
translation.ko: 말 좀 해봐! 노예는 어쩔 거냐고!

translation.en: Oh, God. We're gonna fuck this up, aren't we?
Dagnabbit! I think we missed it, E's.
translation.ko: "워싱튼, 애뎀스, 에디센" 염병할, 우리가 너무 늦었나 봐
